description:
Providing big-firm services with small-firm attention, we offer dedicated personal injury representation at AJ Serafini, Partner of The Poole Law Group. We aid people in Hagerstown, Maryland, as well as in Frederick and throughout the state to recover the maximum compensation for their accident injury-associated losses. Our law firm accepts credit cards.

Aggressively advocating on behalf of our clients' rights and interests, we strive to help those injured through the negligent or reckless actions of others to achieve financial justice. Our firm represents clients with a range of complex claims, including those involving issues such as the following:

  • Car, trucking, aviation and mass transit accidents
  • Birth injuries and medical malpractice
  • Nursing home abuse
  • Animal bites
  • Premises liability
  • Wrongful death

Our firm also handles toxic torts and class action claims, as well as asbestos and mesothelioma and toxic mold cases. We work to resolve our clients' cases in the most efficient and effective manner possible. However, our law firm is prepared to take claims to jury or bench trials when necessary to obtain the damages our clients need and deserve.

At AJ Serafini, Partner of The Poole Law Group, we offer free initial consultations. Before advising potential clients of their options, we take time to get to know them and to understand how their injuries have affected their lives. We tailor our guidance and approach to suit the unique circumstances, needs and goals of each client we represent. Our law firm offers virtual appointments.
